reviewtext: I like the way my Visor snaps into and out of the case. The only drawback with this method is that it does not work with my "eyemodule" digital camera attached because the camera lens is over the top of the unit  where the leather case's clip fits.Even with no papers in the case's  pockets, it feels a little tight around my Visor. I'd recommend a few  millimetres more space to be really confortable. The new leather smalls  classy though.
summary: A little tight, but the leather smells good
